_header: Who is so wounded or ill beat
Title(s): ‘How a sicke man schal dyate him’
_description: ‘How a sicke man schal dyate him’ — in couplets

BLAdd17866.Transcription:
Qwo so is wounded or ille beteGarlek nore oynouns may he non
                    eteNor butter nor chese eyre harde nor nescheNor fish but of þe
                    water frescheNore frutt nor fresche flesche may he ete noneNore touche
                    womman tille he may gone
BLAdd17866.Attributed Title: How a seike man schal dyate hyme (f. 4)
